name: Captain Dodger The Hidden Cargo DLC
name_original: Captain Dodger The Hidden Cargo DLC
description:
Quick Rundown

After clearing the port and killing his enemies, Captain Dodger enters the pirate ship. Avoid their traps and try to unlock all the doors.  Be careful though. The pirates have made it pretty tough to navigate their ship hull. Who knows what kind of cargo they might hide in there. Time to unravel the mystery.
